ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Sparling,Ogden Whitney,Paul Reinman,Harry Lazarus,Paul Reinman,Harry Lazarus,Jack Sparling,Ogden Whitney
ComicInfo.Summary:
Soapbox on Wheels!: A sickly teenager discovers a magic soapbox racer that allows him to travel through time.
Mysteries of Space: Aliens land on the island of Andros in 936 B.C to refuel their ship leaving behind empty fuel canisters. The same thing happens in the Marshall Islands in the present day.
9 Dream of Genie!: An ugly lonely woman forces a genie she frees from a bottom to marry her as one of her three wishes.
Mystery Mews!: Edward Courtney has a recurring nightmare which seems to be part of his father's business partner's ultimate revenge.
ComicInfo.Title: Soapbox on Wheels!; Mysteries of Space; 9 Dream of Genie!; Mystery Mews!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
